Claim: A Method for a Media Gateway in connection to a backbone, comprising the steps of measuring a packet loss or a jitter associated with said backbone, receiving a call when the measured packet loss exceeds a predefined packet loss threshold or when the measured jitter exceeds a pre defined jitter threshold for said backbone
detecting an indication associated with the call, wherein the indication is based on a time period associated with the predefined packet loss threshold or the predefined jitter threshold

indication associated with the call indicates that the measured packet loss exceeding the predefined packet loss threshold or the measured jitter exceeding the predefined jitter threshold is acceptable for the call for said time period.

adjusting the Quality of Service (QoS) level for said call when deciding said call is admitted via a backbone, comprising the steps of measuring a packet loss or a jitter associated with it, receiving a call when the measured packet loss exceeds a predefined packet loss threshold or when the measured jitter exceeds a pre defined jitter threshold

based at least partially on the measured packet loss or the measured jitter and an indication associated with the call associated with the call, deciding whether said call is admitted to be routed via a backbone, comprising the steps of measuring a packet loss or a jitter associated with it, receiving a call when the measured packet loss exceeds a predefined packet loss threshold or when the measured jitter exceeds a pre defined jitter threshold
indication associated with the call is received from an external source such as a Mobile Switching Centre Server.

A Method for a Media Gateway in connection to a backbone, comprising the steps of measuring a packet loss or a jitter associated with said backbone, receiving a call when the measured packet loss exceeds a predefined packet loss threshold or when the measured jitter exceeds a pre defined jitter threshold for said backbone , wherein indication associated with the call is received from an external source such as a Mobile Switching Centre Server.

A Method for a Media Gateway in connection to a backbone, comprising the steps of measuring a packet loss or a jitter associated with said backbone, receiving a call when the measured packet loss exceeds a predefined packet loss threshold or when the measured jitter exceeds a pre defined jitter threshold for said backbone wherein said indication is received in a Gateway Control Protocol (GCP) message.

A Method for a Media Gateway in connection to a backbone, comprising the steps of measuring a packet loss or a jitter associated with said backbone, receiving a call when the measured packet loss exceeds a predefined packet loss threshold or when the measured jitter exceeds a pre defined jitter threshold for said backbone , wherein said indication associated with the call is a priority value within the Gateway Control Protocol message.

comprising a body having a cradle for the handset , wherein the on\off-hook switch operates in response to placing the handset in the cradle
comprising call receiving means for receiving a first call from a calling party
